title: 13 Days of Halloween: Devil's Night
itunes:title: 13 Days of Halloween: Devil's Night
description:
When a 12-year-old boy and his dog are stranded far from home, they must find a way back through the chaos and mayhem of the most dangerous night of the year. 13 Days of Halloween: Devil's Night premieres October 19th. 

 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
